class.name: sfframework/GaussianRepulsion
class.description: A simple SF strategy that applies a Gaussian repulsion field to the points in the point cloud.

class.name: sfframework/ParabolicRest
class.description: A simple SF strategy that applies a parabolic attractive field to a user-defined center point.

class.name: sfframework/WeightedSummation
class.description: Strategy to compute a weighted summation of multiple input layers.

class.name: sfframework/PlaneInclination
class.description: Strategy to compute the inclination of a plane fitted to the input point cloud.
